content: {"name": "Billerica Community Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Call 978-357-7560 or text 978-987-4384 to pre-register and make appointment.\n* Open to Billerica residents only.\n* Must have a car since it's a drive-thru food pantry.", "email": "", "url": "https://mvfb.org/resources/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "11 Concord Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Billerica", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "01821", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.5588029, "longitude": -71.26981789999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(978) 357-7560", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "21:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "21:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Pre-registration required by phone"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Drive-Thru Only"}]}
